dict.acceptation: 模式；花样，样品；图案；榜样，典范；

sent.orig: PATTERN is a set of newline-separated fixed strings.
sent.trans: PATTERN是一套新行分离修复字符串。

sent.orig: Production Type: Casting pattern, gravity pouring Pattern low-pressure casting pattern, Pressure casting pattern, Waxen pattern, Die-casting.
sent.trans: 产品种类：铸造模具、重力浇注模具、压铸模具、低压铸造模具、失蜡铸造模具、冲压模具。

sent.orig: Model View Controller Pattern-The observer pattern is used in the model view controller (MVC) architectural pattern.
sent.trans: 模型、视图、控制器模式-观察者模式被使用在了MVC架构模式。

sent.orig: The pattern preparing system for three-level tufting machine is introduced, including pattern design and pattern conversion.
sent.trans: 介绍了三圈高地毯簇绒机的花型准备系统，包括花型设计和花型转换两大部分。

sent.orig: Fresnel diffraction pattern numerical Fresnel diffraction pattern numerical simulation!
sent.trans: 菲涅耳衍射图样数值模拟！
